author: Dave Cooney
title: "Mega" matchup
text:
"Mega" matchup - Tucson News Now Member Center: dcooney@tucsonnewsnow.com 
Tucson, AZ (KOLD) - There are a lot of new storylines surrounding the Cardinals trip to Detroit. Lions are winless, Arizona lost with Palmer starting, both are coming off last minute losses. One story has remained the same, the game within the game, who will win the battle between arguably the best two players at their respective position... Patrick Peterson vs Calvin Johnson. 
Megatron hasn't necessarily had the eye opening numbers he typically produces. Meanwhile teams still have trouble throwing to Peterson's side. The Arizona Pro-Bowler discusses the difficulty running with the 6'6 250 pounder for 3 hours on Sunday.
